channel.title: Client help rep+
channel.description:
Can someone please tell me where the error is because i am trying to add new sprites to my client but it will not let me compile.
[code=java] ^ .\Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub1_Sub2.java:1: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ .\Class48.java:1: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ .\Class42_Sub1.java:5: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ .\Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub2.java:1: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ .\Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub3.java:1: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ .\Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub4.java:1: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ .\Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub5.java:1: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ .\Class46.java:1: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ .\Class34.java:1: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ .\Class35.java:1: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ .\Class36.java:1: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ .\Class37.java:2: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ .\Class38.java:2: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ .\Class4.java:1: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ .\Class41.java:2: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ .\Class50.java:1: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ .\Class8.java:1: package sign does not exist import sign.signlink; ^ .\Class1.java:53: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class Class1 signlink.reporterror( ^ .\Class12.java:54: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class Class12 signlink.reporterror( ^ .\Class30_Sub2_Sub2.java:159: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class Class30_Sub2_Sub2 signlink.reporterror( ^ .\client.java:44: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.midifade = 0; ^ .\client.java:45: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.midi = "stop"; ^ .\client.java:260: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.storeid = 32; ^ .\client.java:261: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost()); ^ .\client.java:273: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client if (signlink.mainapp != null) { ^ .\client.java:274: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.startthread(runnable, i); ^ .\client.java:284: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client if (signlink.mainapp != null) { ^ .\client.java:285: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client return signlink.opensocket(i); ^ .\client.java:416: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.midifade = flag ? 1 : 0; ^ .\client.java:417: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.midisave(abyte0, abyte0.length); ^ .\client.java:605: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client if (aBoolean960 && signlink.cache_dat != null) { ^ .\client.java:876: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client return signlink.wavereplay(); ^ .\client.java:1201: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.reporterror( ^ .\client.java:1208: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.reporterror( ^ .\client.java:1723: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.reporterror( ^ .\client.java:2119: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.reporterror( ^ .\client.java:2797: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.storeid = 32; ^ .\client.java:2798: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost()); ^ .\client.java:2834: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.reporterror( ^ .\client.java:2968: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client if (signlink.mainapp != null) { ^ .\client.java:2969: package signlink does not exist return signlink.mainapp.getAppletContext(); ^ .\client.java:3160: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client return signlink.wavesave(abyte0, i); ^ .\client.java:3867: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client if (!signlink.reporterror) { ^ .\client.java:3873: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client if (!signlink.reporterror) { ^ .\client.java:3879: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client if (!signlink.reporterror) { ^ .\client.java:5275: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.reporterror = false; ^ .\client.java:5430: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client if (signlink.mainapp != null) { ^ .\client.java:5431: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client return signlink.mainapp; ^ .\client.java:6097: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client + signlink.dns; ^ .\client.java:6412: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client if (signlink.mainapp != null) { ^ .\client.java:6413: package signlink does not exist return signlink.mainapp.getDocumentBase().getHost().toLowerCase(); ^ .\client.java:6544: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.errorname = s; ^ .\client.java:6587: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_1192.method402(signlink.uid); ^ .\client.java:7538: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client if (signlink.sunjava) { ^ .\client.java:7548: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client if (signlink.cache_dat != null) { ^ .\client.java:7550: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client aClass14Array970[i] = new Class14(0xffffff, signlink.cache_dat, ^ .\client.java:7551: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.cache_idx[i], i + 1, true); ^ .\client.java:8040: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.reporterror("loaderror " + aString1049 + " " + anInt1079); ^ .\client.java:9772: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.reporterror("cde2"); ^ .\client.java:9935: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.reporterror( ^ .\client.java:10020: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.wavevol = i; ^ .\client.java:10144: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.reporterror( ^ .\client.java:10590: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.reporterror( ^ .\client.java:10598: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client if (signlink.mainapp != null) { ^ .\client.java:10599: package signlink does not exist return signlink.mainapp.getParameter(s); ^ .\client.java:10611: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.midivol = i; ^ .\client.java:10613: cannot find symbol symbol : variable signlink location: class client signlink.midi = "voladjust"; ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 100 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
http://uppit.com/ack4z07uxtn7/Pr0digyscape_Client.rar Here is the link to the client i am using.

item.title: Client help rep+
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

it says package sign does not exist? try removing the sign. that is infront of signlink.java

Read full topic

item.title: Client help rep+
item.dc:creator: @Bandos1337 Bandos1337
item.description:
@Bandos1337 wrote:

I took the sign. off wherever it says sign.signlink.something, and it compiled fine for me. Tell me if this works.

Read full topic

item.title: Client help rep+
item.dc:creator: @smokin_flax smokin flax
item.description:
@smokin_flax wrote:

[quote=“Aceron4, post:3, topic:389089”]Hmm. Almost all those error have something to do with signlink.

Do you even have signlink.java?[/quote]
Yeah who doesn’t? try using an IDE or upload your client.

Read full topic
